title: Coby DP700BLK 7-Inch Digital Picture Frame -Black
description: Colby's 700BLK 7 In. Widescreen Digital Photo Frame displays your photos is style. A sleek contemporary frame in black sets off a vibrant, widescreen 7-inch LCD screen. The frame features a built-in USB port and SD/MS card slots to allow for quick and easy viewing. Calendar and clock functions are also included.
